PyWinEXE
========

|Build| |PyPI1| |PyPI2| |PyPI3| |Coverage|

Overview
--------

A Python wrapper class for WinEXE

Installation
------------

To install use pip:

::

    $ pip install pywinexe

Or clone the repo:

::

    $ git clone https://github.com/tonybaloney/pywinexe.git
    $ python setup.py install
